title: Celery, Apple, And Fennel Slaw
summary: You can never have too many side dish recipes, so give Celery, Apple, And Fennel Slaw a try. For $1.0 per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 4 servings with 169 calories, 2g of protein, and 11g of fat each. 90 people have made this recipe and would make it again. It will be a hit at your The Fourth Of July event. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegan diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. If you have apple, fennel bulbs, sugar, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 81%. This score is super. Try Fennel Apple And Celery Slaw, Apple, Fennel, and Celery Slaw, and Celery, Apple, and Fennel Slaw for similar recipes.
